College of Applied Health Sciences     Search the site      Toggle Menu     Search             College of Applied Health Sciences     College of Applied Health Sciences   Google Translate  Main Menu    Applying          Degrees and Deadlines    Beyond the Classroom    Tuition and Aid    Newly Admitted Students      Academics           Departments and Programs         Biomedical and Health Information Sciences           Disability and Human Development           Kinesiology and Nutrition           Occupational Therapy           Physical Therapy           Rehabilitation Sciences         Departments and Programs      Research          Research Labs and Centers    Metabolic Kitchen      Community Services          Assistive Technology Unit    Developmental Disabilities Family Clinic    Occupational Therapy Faculty Practice    Physical Therapy Faculty Practice      Alumni          Give to AHS          Give to AHS    Where to Give      AHS Alumni Awards          Alumni Award Recipients      Meet Our Alumni    Corporate Partners Program    News    Events    Contact      About AHS          College News    College Calendar    Committees    Contact       Eyebrow menu    Inside AHS    AHS Directory    Give to AHS    UIC menu    UIC.edu    UI Health    Campus Map      Search the site                     COVID-19 on Inside AHS  COVID-19 updates, resources and announcements for AHS students, faculty and staff        View Menu            Breadcrumbs   Home  Applying  Beyond the Classroom      Beyond the Classroom  After you enroll, you won't just learn from books—you'll learn from life  An AHS education means more than just lectures and lab time. Our students are active in the community and in their fields, creating opportunities and forming relationships that shape their future. We believe that you’re always learning, no matter where you are.  From research to community engagement to student groups and events, whatever your interests are, you’ll find support to make your time here what you want it to be.      AHS Summer Exploration and Transition Institute       Looking for exciting jump-start to college? Participate in the AHS Summer Exploration and Transition Institute (AHS:SET)!  AHS:SET takes place over two days during the summer with the goal to engage and prepare AHS incoming freshmen and transfer students in a fun and interactive format.  Learn about academic course work, research opportunities and resources available to you for navigating the rigors of an AHS degree.  Sharpen your skills, make connections and learn about AHS – all before your first semester at UIC!      Find out more and register       Our students in action            Transfer training at the Chinese American Service League  AHS student volunteers conduct training workshops for more than 300 home healthcare aides      See them in action              Learning around the globe  Make the world your campus, participate in our study abroad program      See them in action              Learning to innovate, collborate under pressure  The Health Tech Jam brought together AHS students and issued a challenge: develop a technological solution to a common health care problem — and do it in just six hours      See them in action            The AHS experience        Student organizations   Get involved in activities with students that share your interests         Events   From seminars to bake sales, there's always something to do on campus         Campus recreation   Providing recreational experiences which positively engage students through learning and leadership opportunities         UIC Diversity   Promoting an organizational culture and structure, grounded on the principles of access, equity and inclusion         UIC Office of Study Abroad   Supporting as many students as possible in becoming effective and influential leaders in civil society         UIC Student Life   Dedicated to providing a welcoming environment for its students and fostering a sense of belonging                     Inside AHS  The online community for and by students, faculty and staff  Inside AHS connects you with news, events and resources hand-picked and posted by other AHS’ers. If you want to get a glimpse inside our college, this is the place!   Go Inside AHS        AHS Magazine   AHS Magazine is the premier publication for and about members and friends of the UIC College of Applied Health Sciences community. Learn about all the great things happening in and beyond our classrooms.
